extendedInfo.description: ***ZERO Investment Business...! Become a MOBILE RETAILER....!***-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------Contact here for UserID & Password :01416066123, 09309090778(Call during 10:00 AM to 6:00 PM)--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------Online Recharge Portal:DHS provides mobile users 24X7 customer Service assistance as it allows them to selectfrom multiple telecom service providers which are listed on the website. It provides:* Complete Instant recharging Solution anytime,anywhere in India* Recharges for all the Service providers AVAILABLE HERE...!!* Attractive Flat Margins are offered as:         => Super Distributor -> FLAT 3%         => Distributor -> FLAT 2.75%         => Retailer -> Flat 2.5%* Easy Recharges on(Prepaid/Postpaid):         => Cellular Phones         => DTH Service         => Data Card* We provide 4 impressive & Easy to Access Apps for instant Recharging, namely:	=> Android App	    Easy Recharges Via Android Phones	=> JAVA App	    Specifically designed for Recharging via NOKIA Mobile Phones & J2ME	=> Recharge Portal	    Online recharge solution	=> Recharge facility through SMS* You can avail Our Membership as:      => Super Distributor      => Distributor      => retailerAvail best Service, we Serve you Better...!!!

reviews.title: Making trouble
reviews.comment: Fund transfer doesn\'t work Always have to call 4-5 times to make the amount transfer in my account  Deposited 1000 rs through check almost 2 weeks before even then the amount has not been transfered  Have almost above 500 rs and even then not able to recharge ryt now  When calling no one pics up the phone  Starting to get frustrated because of all this..

reviews.title: every time log in issue
reviews.comment: it needs to enter user name &password each and every time to use the apps.     like these kinds of apps should not needs it every time.      for example mobikwik, paytm etc are one time log in apps.      please fix it.  thanks for providing a good application.
